fields.Title of Presentation: "Describing Student Self-Efficacy in Online First-Year Writing"
fields.Conference / Meeting Name: Boise State Teaching Scholars Poster Session
fields.Sponsoring Organization: Center for Teaching and Learning, Boise State University
fields.Description/Abstract: Through qualitative research (coding of student reflection and analysis of coding), I analyzed the relationship that student self-efficacy may have with student persistence within a fully-online first-year writing course.
